import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import { ghUserData } from '../Services/userapi' //const nl2br = require('react-nl2br'); const Dashboardgh = (props) => { const [userlist, setUserlist] = useState([]); // set the props as a default userid in userid state useEffect(() => { if (props.loggedinuser.user_id) { setUserid(props.loggedinuser.user_id); } }, [props.loggedinuser.user_id]) // eslint-disable-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps useEffect(() => { const getUserList = async () => { const storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("MyUser")); let res = await ghUserData(storedData.user_id); if (res.data.message === 'user list fetched') { setUserlist(res.data.userdata) } else { alert(res.data.message) } } getUserList(); }, []) // eslint-disable-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps return ( <>
{ userlist.map((userdata, index) => <> ) }
